project_abstract.cdata: The Third Industrial Credit Project will provide: (i) subloans for fixed assets (purchase and installation or repair of machinery and equipment, or replacement parts, and construction of buildings and related infrastructure) and associated permanent working capital; (ii) free standing permanent working capital subloans to previous National Industrial Development Fund (FONDEI) sub-borrowers seeking to expand utilization of installed capacity. Also included in the loan is a technical assistance component to provide consulting services and equipment for institution strengthening, improvement of appraisal and supervision capability, and training.
